identity.name: Radar de Clientes
identity.mission: Democratize market intelligence for small Brazilian businesses.
identity.persona: The Friendly Consultant. Smart, approachable, speaks plain Portuguese, and focuses on growth, not just data.
identity.visual_style: Friendly Professional. High clarity, warm neutrals, vibrant accents, mobile-first ergonomics.

primary.description: Indigo 500 - The 'Intelligence' color. Use for primary actions, active states, and brand moments.

secondary.description: Orange 500 - The 'Growth' color. Use for alerts, conversion buttons, and highlights.

background.description: Slate 50 (Light) / Slate 900 (Dark). Never pure white or black.

surface.description: White (Light) / Slate 800 (Dark). For cards and containers.

grid_system.bento_rules: Use 'col-span-full' for heroes, 'col-span-6' for charts, 'col-span-4' for stats.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold text-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 shadow-sm rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-2xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.glass: bg-white/80 dark:bg-slate-900/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-lg

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all

navigation.mobile: Fixed bottom bar, glassmorphism, 4-5 key icons (Home, Radar, Leads, Profile).

visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows for primary actions (e.g., shadow-indigo-500/20).
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on backgrounds to reduce digital sterility.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) or Lucide React. Use stroke-width=1.5 for elegance.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-900 on light backgrounds, Slate-50 on dark.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2) are mandatory.
accessibility.labels: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Outfit' and 'Figtree' font families and the custom color palette.
3. MOBILE FIRST: Build the Dashboard Overview as a vertical feed of 'Insight Cards' first, then expand to a grid for desktop.
4. USE SHADCN: Use the provided Shadcn components but OVERRIDE the default 'radius' and 'border' styles to match the 'Friendly Professional' look (rounded-2xl, soft borders).
5. NO LOREM IPSUM: Use realistic Portuguese copy (e.g., 'Tendências de Hoje', 'Novos Clientes', 'Sua Reputação').
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Do not use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A).
Do not use gradients on text (readability risk).
Ensure all images have alt text.
